job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Full Stack Web
similar_jobs: Senior Software Engineer Jobs in Canada
job_description:
About The Role
At Shakudo, we are transforming the way data-driven organizations develop, scale, deploy, and maintain their data stack. Our end-to-end data platform offers ever-evolving, fully managed, best-of-breed open-source components tailored to each business's unique needs, eliminating operational overhead and reducing costs.

The engineering team at Shakudo is looking for a Senior Software Engineer - Full Stack Web. As a Senior Software Engineer - Full Stack Web, you will design, build and maintain the customer-facing applications of Shakudo using React, GraphQL, Material UI, Postgres and other leading tools.

Basic Technical Qualifications
5+ years developing React web applications
Experience with: Typescript, React, Node.js, Material UI, PostgreSQL, Prisma, TypeGraphQL
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or Engineering

Non-technical Skill Requirements
Bias for action and ownership mentality
Comfort with ambiguity and operating in a fast-paced environment
Experience working cross-functionally with product management
Startup experience at a SaaS company

What You'll Do
Develop, test, deploy, and maintain the Shakudo user facing web application
Participate in code reviews to ensure code quality and distribute knowledge
Unblock, support and effectively communicate cross-functionally in order to achieve results
Participate in regular on-call rotation for production systems
Be part of an inclusive, collaborative team that embraces pairing and healthy discussions
Help define the team roadmap and architecture based on technology and business needs

Our Culture
At Shakudo, we take pride in cultivating an engaged, diverse, and fun workplace where everyone feels welcome and motivated. We work hard, and we value the results and dedication that our team brings to the table. We strongly believe that passion and persistence are key to our collective success. As a team, we support and empower one another to grow both professionally and personally, fostering a supportive culture that prioritizes the greater good of the team over individual incentives.

We are passionate about our customers and obsessively focused on their success, always striving to deliver exceptional service and value. As a forward-thinking organization, we believe in a "think big" mindset and are committed to building something truly groundbreaking. To stay at the forefront of the data and AI industry, we constantly explore and adopt the latest technologies and innovations, actively contributing to the AI ecosystem and engaging in collaborative community efforts.

At Shakudo, we are committed to fostering diversity and inclusivity and take great care in ensuring our hiring process meets equal employment opportunity standards. We welcome applications from a broad range of backgrounds and experiences.
